name: Clicky! [default and looper gamemode]
description:
Hey guys! This is my second commited project which took 359 line of code to make this possible. Anyways lets get started:

Controls:

ctrl: exit game

Space: start game

When you complete the game, Press enter/return

Game Instructions:

Press the start game button and click the keyboard buttons as you see them on the screen. Pay attention to what you type though, Because in those letters is a 3 letter word. Can ya find it?

QOIUYTREWPALKJHGFDSZMNBVCX

Clicky Looper Gamemode:

Download The File

Extract The File

Open The Clicky Looper Folder

Open Quick Clicky Prototype Test].exe

Have Fun!

Clicky 2 May Be Coming Soon!
